title: Did you buy the ‘right’ Pixel 6 model? [Poll]
content:
After my fourth or fifth switch back-and-forth between the latest flagship duo, I’m beginning to feel that while the bigger, more capable Pro model is objectively better, it doesn’t quite exude the same charm as the smaller, approachable, and infinitely more “fun” Pixel 6.

more…

The post Did you buy the ‘right’ Pixel 6 model? [Poll] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: With two distinct models, the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro sometimes feel at odds with each other. Do you think you made the right choice?
